citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10am on April
17, 2023. The inspector spoke to the licensee on the phone, and she stated that she was out of town for the day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10am on April 
17, 2023. The inspector spoke to the licensee on the phone, and she stated that she was out of town for the day. 
 
 
 
End Section
